abstract: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, the world’s most valuable lender, said Wednesday that it was looking for acquisitions in countries in Southeast Asia where now it has no presence.
snippet: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, the world’s most valuable lender, said Wednesday that it was looking for acquisitions in countries in Southeast Asia where now it has no presence.
lead_paragraph: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China said on Wednesday that it was looking for acquisitions in countries in Southeast Asia where now it has no presence, Reuters reports.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
